item.title: Need a little help please!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Just rename the variable

//Random System Message if(messageTimer > 0) { messageTimer--; } else { for(Player p2 : players) { if(p2 != null) { p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "Remember to vote for MaGiikz Scape daily!"); //Change your message! p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "The Haloween event is still avaliable!"); //Change your message! } } messageTimer = 3000; //Change to 10 times the number of seconds you want 600 = 60 seconds }

item.title: Need a little help please!
item.dc:creator: @Liru Liru
item.description:
@Liru wrote:

Palidino 76 508:
Alright so using a tutorial so that theres is a random message every 5 minutes…
but theres an error due to the fact

for(Player p : players) {
is used for castle wars therefor it is already defined can anyone help?

Code:

//Random System Message if(messageTimer > 0) { messageTimer--; } else { for(Player p : players) { if(p != null) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "Remember to vote for MaGiikz Scape daily!"); //Change your message! p.frames.sendMessage(p, "The Haloween event is still avaliable!"); //Change your message! } } messageTimer = 3000; //Change to 10 times the number of seconds you want 600 = 60 seconds }

Just incase this helps, the public void is:

public void run() {
